https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uOvKv0lDIDQMkdTeuIMfmwiZKwB.jpg The life of the Nobel Prize-winning mathematician and schizophrenic John Nash — the inspiration for the feature film A Beautiful Mind — is a powerful exploration of how genius and madness can become intertwined. American Experience: A Brilliant Madness
